analysis.description: EthereumByte.isNotContract (/unique_chucks/24/0xd2fddd171eb3a219928edcccdc249a874003ea0b.sol#165-173) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/24/0xd2fddd171eb3a219928edcccdc249a874003ea0b.sol:

	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0xd2fddd171eb3a219928edcccdc249a874003ea0b.sol)
